sections.heading: of good faith.Every contract governed by sections 76-825 to 76-894 imposes an obligation of good faith in its performance

sections.text:
76-836.Obligation of good faith.

Every contract governed by sections 76-825 to 76-894 imposes an obligation of good faith in its performance.

SourceLaws 1983, LB 433, ยง 12.
